short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A payment integration extension for sending payments to card reader terminals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users who have integrated with AnimalCareTechnologies to accept terminal purchases using their web based practice management system. The extension currently support EzyVet, EVetPractice, NaVetor, Vetport, Idexx Neo, and Vetter integration with more practice management systems coming soon!
